EXTENSION SCHOOLS

[/et_pb_fullwidth_code][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.4″ background_enable_image=”off” custom_padding=”30px||30px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||5px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#000000″ text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

At Altamira, our goal is to complement the comprehensive education our students receive by providing alternative spaces where they can pursue their passions, develop new skills, collaborate, and have fun. We believe in the importance of offering activities that allow students to explore their physical, creative, social, political, and professional interests alongside like-minded peers.

In our Extension Schools, such as Sports, Music, Code, Robotics, and Arts, students have the opportunity to collaborate, communicate, be creative, and develop critical thinking skills that will enable them to excel in the twenty-first century.
We take pride in offering a variety of options so that each student can find a space to flourish and grow both academically and personally. Our Extension Schools not only provide opportunities for learning and continuous improvement but also foster the building of meaningful and lasting relationships among our students.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||16px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|700|||||||” text_text_color=”gcid-c06f992e-1a1f-4a27-8457-39b06448a507″ text_font_size=”32px” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-c06f992e-1a1f-4a27-8457-39b06448a507%22:%91%22text_text_color%22%93}”]

excerpt.rendered:
At Altamira, our goal is to complement the comprehensive education our students receive by providing alternative spaces where they can pursue their passions, develop new skills, collaborate, and have fun. We believe in the importance of offering activities that allow students to explore their physical, creative, social, political, and professional interests alongside like-minded peers. In our Extension Schools, such as Sports, Music, Code, Robotics, and Arts, students have the opportunity to collaborate, communicate, be creative, and develop critical thinking skills that will enable them to excel in the twenty-first century.We take pride in offering a variety of options so that each student can find a space to flourish and grow both academically and personally. Our Extension Schools not only provide opportunities for learning and continuous improvement but also foster the building of meaningful and lasting relationships among our students.GET TO KNOW OUR EXTENSION SCHOOLS
